title: It's All Your Fault | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community.   Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by: Blinkist. Visit www.blinkist.com/IMPACT to try out the premium service completely free for 7 days! Four Sigmatic: Visit foursigmatic.com/impacttheory and use discount code: "IMPACT" for 15% off your order ButcherBox. Use the discount code: "IMPACT" at butcherbox.com to get 20$ off and FREE BACON Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact   QUESTION TOPICS How to curb the high turnover rate of millennials in the workplace [3:45] How to monetize your passion [13:40] Books that Tom has read recently that he has enjoyed [15:30] Tom explains how you can speed up your business knowledge [21:13] How to change what you build your self-esteem around [23:20] Ways you can overcome your fear of pain [27:04] When you should learn a skill to complete a task vs. when to delegating it to someone who has that skill already [29:25] How Tom takes notes when reading [30:57]   BOOKS MENTIONED Maps of Meaning by Jordan Peterson: https://amzn.to/2mZ1BYQ [16:06] Gulag Archipelago by Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn: https://amzn.to/2M7rLna [16:28] The E-Myth by Michael E. Gerber: https://amzn.to/2LPeqmv [21:26]     If you want your question answered by Tom on an AMA, Please submit your questions in advance to connect@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”
